about_the_game:
The end is nahual: If I may say so is a mesoamerican puzzle adventure game about nothing, where you'll play as Jacob a man searching for revenge and Sammael the last of the nahuals, which doesn't want that revenge to happen.

You'll start in the second chapter of the game, which we believe portrays in the best way the type of game that THE END IS NAHUAL is, where you'll have to solve puzzles and have quick reflexes to solve any challenges that we throw your way.
